1.0.name: wordpress/ultra-hide-comments-box
1.0.description: This simple plugin lets you choose which category(s) you want to accept comments on. It has a simple admin interface that is very easy to use. You simple check the category that you don't want to see comments on and the comment box will not appear on any posts in that category.
